name: Gastric Voyage
description:
Take control of Leuk the Leukocyte and get ready for a Gastric Voyage!  Battle  food borne illnesses like Listeria and Salmonella as you fight to take back control of your body. 

Gastric Voyage is a small top-down shooter game where you collect powerups and fight enemies. There are two levels with the second level culminating in a boss fight.

Controls:

  • ARROW KEYS - Move
  • Z - Shoot Antibody
  • X - Dash Attack
  • C - Lock Direction (for strafing)
  • Space - Pause Game, Skip Cutscenes

Credits:
